sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"文章，论文"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: composition, article, essay, paper, prose, thesis, theme, dissertation
means: composition ： 多指学校里老师给学生的作文练习。
article ： 多指在报刊、杂志上发表的非文艺性的文章，包括新闻报导、学术论文等。
essay ： 指任何一种非小说性的，篇幅不长、结构简练的文章，如论说文、报道、评论、讽刺性杂文等。
paper ： 正式用词，多指在学术刊物上发表或在学术会议上宣读的专题论文，也指高等学校的学期论文，或学校里的作文练习。
thesis ： 既可指毕业论文、学位论文，又可指一般的为阐述学术观点而写的论文。
theme ： 一般指大学或高中生作为作业所写的篇幅有限、较完整论述某个观点的文章。也可指作品或谈话的主要论题。
dissertation ： 书面语用词，指独立研究后所写的较为详细的专题文章；也可指学位论文。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均含"文件"之意。
means: paper ： 普通用词，泛指成册供将来参考或使用的任何文件或公文等。
document ： 即可指法律性文件，也可指用作证明或消息来源的文件或记录等。

...一个小石桌旁，谈到了第二次世界大战后世界的格局和中国的战局。毛主席在这次谈话中发表了“一切反动派都是纸老虎“的著名论断。余光生是这次谈话的英文翻译。据当时《解放日报》的编辑黎辛的回忆，此次谈话的第二天，余光生便在报社的全体会议上传达了谈话的情况。余光生说：“毛主席的这个论断非常英明。“余光生还特别向大家介绍了此次谈话的一些具体细节。余光生说，毛主席的思路十分敏捷，智慧过人。毛主席在谈话中提到了纸老虎，但英语的习惯用法中没有这个组合词，因此余光生翻译时用了英语中类似的习惯用语“稻草人“来代替，由于毛主

be written about in newspapers and thus become famous or notorious
disguise problems or divisions rather than trying to solve them

jx.jx_en_mean: In theory, as opposed to actual performance or fact
jx.jx_cn_mean: 理论上：在理论上，不同于真实的表现或事实

means.word_mean: 文件,特权,遗嘱,证件,收据

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French papir, from Latin papyrus 'paper-reed' (see papyrus). The verb dates from the late 16th cent

entry.def: Paper is a material that you write on or wrap things with. The pages of this book are made of paper.

example.ex: He wrote his name down on a piece of paper for me...
example.tran: 他把他的名字写在一张纸上交给我。

example.ex: She sat at the table with pen and paper.
example.tran: 她拿着纸笔坐在桌旁。

example.ex: I might get a paper in the village...
example.tran: 我或许能在村子里找到一份报纸。

example.ex: I'll cook and you read the paper.
example.tran: 我做饭，你看报纸。

entry.def: You can refer to newspapers in general as the paper or the papers .

example.ex: You can't believe everything you read in the paper...
example.tran: 报纸上看到的东西不能全信。

example.ex: There's been a lot in the papers about the problems facing stepchildren.
example.tran: 报纸上有很多关于继子女所面临的问题的报道。

entry.def: Your papers are sheets of paper with writing or information on them, which you might keep in a safe place at home.

example.ex: Her papers included unpublished articles and correspondence.
example.tran: 她的资料包括未发表的文章和信件。

entry.def: Your papers are official documents, for example your passport or identity card, which prove who you are or which give you official permission to do something.

example.ex: A young Moroccan stopped by police refused to show his papers...
example.tran: 一位被警察拦下的摩洛哥青年拒绝出示他的证件。

example.ex: They have arrested four people who were trying to leave the country with forged papers.
example.tran: 他们已经逮捕了4名企图利用伪造证件离境的人。

entry.def: A paper is a long, formal piece of writing about an academic subject.

example.ex: He just published a paper in the journal Nature analyzing the fires.
example.tran: 他刚刚在《自然》杂志上发表了一篇分析火灾的论文。

entry.def: A paper is an essay written by a student.

example.ex: ...the ten common errors that appear most frequently in student papers.
example.tran: 学生论文中最常见的10个错误

entry.def: A paper is a part of a written examination in which you answer a number of questions in a particular period of time.

example.ex: We sat each paper in the Hall...
example.tran: 我们每一场考试都是在大厅里考的。

example.ex: She finished the exam paper.
example.tran: 她答完了考卷。

entry.tran: （政府或委员会发表的关于重大问题的）文件，报告
entry.def: A paper prepared by a government or a committee is a report on a question they have been considering or a set of proposals for changes in the law.

example.ex: ...a new government paper on European policy.
example.tran: 有关欧洲政策的新政府文件

entry.def: Paper agreements, qualifications, or profits are ones that are stated by official documents to exist, although they may not really be effective or useful.

example.ex: They expressed deep mistrust of the paper promises...
example.tran: 他们对书面承诺表现出极度的不信任。

example.ex: We're looking for people who have experience rather than paper qualifications.
example.tran: 我们要找有经验的人，而不是有文凭的人。

entry.def: If you paper a wall, you put wallpaper on it.

example.ex: We papered all four bedrooms...
example.tran: 我们把4个卧室都贴了墙纸。

example.ex: We have papered this bedroom in softest grey...
example.tran: 我们给这个卧室贴上了极柔和的灰色壁纸。

entry.def: If you put your thoughts down on paper, you write them down.

example.ex: It is important to get something down on paper...
example.tran: 把一些东西写在纸上很重要。

example.ex: It was the first time I had put it all down on paper. I found it helped.
example.tran: 这是我第一次把所有的东西都写在纸上，我觉得这有帮助。

entry.def: If something seems to be the case on paper, it seems to be the case from what you read or hear about it, but it may not really be the case.

example.ex: On paper, I am the healthiest man alive, yet I feel permanently unwell.
example.tran: 理论上，我是活着的最健康的人，但是我总感觉不舒服。

example.ex: The family is estimated to have been worth, on paper at least, more than £1.1billion.
example.tran: 据估计，这个家族理论上至少拥有11亿英镑以上的财富。

entry.def: If you say that a promise, an agreement, or a guarantee is not worth the paper it's written on, you mean that although it has been written down and seems to be official, it is in fact worthless because what has been promised will not be done.

means.word_mean: 1. a material made of cellulose pulp derived mainly from wood or rags or certain grasses
2. an essay (especially one written as an assignment);

sentences.sentence: "he got an A on his composition"

means.word_mean: 3. a daily or weekly publication on folded sheets; contains news and articles and advertisements;
4. a scholarly article describing the results of observations or stating hypotheses;

sentences.sentence: "the notion of an office running without paper is absurd"

means.word_mean: 6. a business firm that publishes newspapers;
7. a newspaper as a physical object;

sentences.sentence: "when it began to rain he covered his head with a newspaper"
"they wore paper hats at the party"

example.zh: 在我看来，他没有什么了不起的，你不必理会他。

Sentence.sentence: Printing with moveable type on paper dramatically reduced the cost of producing a book compared with the old-fashioned ones handwritten on vellum, which comes from sheepskin.
I'll tell my secretary to put the paper in my mail box, and I'll get it when I return.
In the morning, I just sit in comfort and read the papers to catch up with the news.
Did you read the article in the paper about the mayor's speech at the economic forum?
In a paper published recently, Kapur applied the principle of productive failure to mathematical problem solving in three schools
In the 1930s,when only one in 10 Americans had a degree from a four-year college, an admissions committee was content to ask for a sample of applicants'chool papers to assess their writing ability

sentences.en: The public are requested not to throw waste paper in the park.
sentences.cn: 公众被要求不得在公园里乱扔废纸。

sentences.en: The papers forecast clear skies tomorrow.
I asked him to fetch me the evening paper.
sentences.cn: 我请他去给我把晚报拿来。

sentences.en: Assemble your papers and put them in the file.
sentences.cn: 把你的文件归拢放在这个文件夹内。

means.word_mean: 文章，（学生的）研究报告，论文

sentences.en: My paper consists of ten pages.
The teacher demands that students should turn in their test papers within two hours.
sentences.cn: 老师要求学生两小时内交卷。

sentences.en: When did your father last time paper the room?
sentences.cn: 上次, 你父亲是什么时候用纸裱糊房间的?
我们正在给这间屋子贴壁纸。
她很仔细地用纸把橘子包起来。

sentences.en: He agreed to paper over the cracks for the period of the election.
sentences.cn: 他同意在选举期间暂时把分歧掩盖起来。

jushi.english: His desk is always covered with papers.
jushi.chinese: 他的桌子老是用写过字的纸盖着。

jushi.english: I left all the papers in my handbag.
jushi.chinese: 所有的票据都忘在我的手提袋里了。

jushi.english: She gave all her historical papers to the library.
jushi.chinese: 她把所有有关历史的文件都送给图书馆。
